metadata.title: Career Timeline - Soumitra Ghosh
metadata.description: Interactive timeline showcasing career progression and key projects from 1995 to 2025

2025.title: AI-Powered Analytics Platform
2025.description: Leading development of next-gen analytics using machine learning and real-time data processing.

2024.title: Cloud Migration Initiative
2024.description: Orchestrated enterprise-wide migration to AWS, reducing costs by 40% and improving scalability.

2023.title: Microservices Architecture
2023.description: Redesigned monolithic application into scalable microservices using Docker and Kubernetes.

2022.title: Mobile App Development
2022.description: Built cross-platform mobile application serving 100K+ users with React Native.

2021.title: DevOps Transformation
2021.description: Implemented CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code, reducing deployment time by 80%.

2020.title: Remote Work Platform
2020.description: Developed collaboration platform during pandemic, enabling seamless remote work for 500+ employees.

2019.title: Blockchain Integration
2019.description: Integrated blockchain technology for supply chain transparency and smart contracts.

2018.title: Machine Learning Pipeline
2018.description: Built ML pipeline for predictive analytics, improving business forecasting accuracy by 60%.

2017.title: API Gateway Implementation
2017.description: Designed and implemented enterprise API gateway handling 1M+ requests daily.

2016.title: Big Data Analytics
2016.description: Developed real-time analytics platform processing terabytes of data using Hadoop and Spark.

2015.title: E-commerce Platform
2015.description: Built scalable e-commerce solution handling Black Friday traffic spikes.

2014.title: Mobile-First Redesign
2014.description: Led mobile-first redesign of legacy web application, improving user engagement by 150%.

2013.title: Cloud Infrastructure
2013.description: Migrated on-premise infrastructure to cloud, establishing foundation for modern DevOps.

2012.title: Social Media Integration
2012.description: Integrated social media APIs and built viral marketing features.

2011.title: Performance Optimization
2011.description: Optimized database queries and caching, reducing page load times by 70%.

2010.title: Agile Transformation
2010.description: Led transition from waterfall to agile methodology, improving delivery speed by 50%.

2009.title: Web Services Architecture
2009.description: Designed SOA-based web services architecture for enterprise integration.

2008.title: Database Modernization
2008.description: Migrated legacy database systems to modern RDBMS with improved performance.

2007.title: Security Framework
2007.description: Implemented comprehensive security framework including authentication and authorization.

2006.title: Content Management System
2006.description: Built custom CMS for multi-site content management and workflow automation.

2005.title: Enterprise Integration
2005.description: Developed ERP integration solutions connecting disparate business systems.

2004.title: Web Application Framework
2004.description: Created reusable web application framework reducing development time by 40%.

2003.title: Customer Portal
2003.description: Built self-service customer portal with account management and support features.

2002.title: Inventory Management System
2002.description: Developed real-time inventory tracking system for manufacturing operations.

2001.title: B2B E-commerce Platform
2001.description: Created B2B trading platform facilitating millions in transactions.

2000.title: Y2K Remediation
2000.description: Led Y2K compliance project ensuring business continuity during millennium transition.

1999.title: Data Warehouse Implementation
1999.description: Built enterprise data warehouse for business intelligence and reporting.

1998.title: Client-Server Migration
1998.description: Migrated mainframe applications to client-server architecture.

1997.title: Network Infrastructure
1997.description: Designed and implemented corporate network infrastructure and protocols.

1996.title: Database Administration
1996.description: Managed enterprise databases and implemented backup/recovery procedures.

1995.title: System Integration
1995.description: Started career integrating legacy systems and modernizing business processes.
